name: Scarpa Maestro Mid ECO Rock Shoes - Men's
description: A trad shoe that blends performance with comfort, it's not traditionally stiff, but supports your foot with a tensioning system that runs under the mid-foot and over the heel. A plastic midsole extends this fine balance of flexibility with stiffness and allows you to smear and edge with precision. The higher cut protects your ankle bones when your jamming or cranking 40 metres of offwidth (you know you love it). A great balance of performance, support and sensitivity, as any good climbing partner should bring.Eco Leather upper for comfort and durability.Patterned upper keeps seams away from high friction areas for comfort while jamming.Barrel laces add protection to prevent abrasion in cracks.IPC-Tension active rand tensions and supports your foot without unnecessary stiffness.Relion midsole balances stiffness and flexibility to give confidence while smearing and power while edging.4mm Vibram XS Edge rubber outsole for durability and grip.Members typically downsize 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from their street shoe size.
